title: Formulating and Implementing Policies
summary: The newsletter discusses the Open Public Records Act (OPRA) under Washington State law, emphasizing access to records unless exempted by statute or regulation. Key updates include RCW 402.5-18 through 402.5-36 and the impact of state laws on record access.
compressed_content: RCW 402.5-18 through 402.5-36 allow access to records unless exempted. Exemptions for records accessed under state law. Impact of Washington State Open Public Records Act on record access.
search_text: Open Public Records Act (OPRA) records exemptions state laws
corruption_notes: Missing essential fields: date. This newsletter may have incomplete data extraction.
